thread.title: Katy Perry invites fan to stage, gets more than she bargained for
thread.title_full: Katy Perry invites fan to stage, gets more than she bargained for

title: Katy Perry invites fan to stage, gets more than she bargained for
text:
Updated: 8:34 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 | Posted: 8:17 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 Katy Perry invites fan to stage, gets more than she bargained for Related By Cox Media Group National Content Desk RIO DE JANEIRO â€” 
That didn't go as well as planned, but an invite to a fan to join Katy Perry is going viral. 
Over the weekend, the "Roar" singer invited a concertgoer to join her on stage, but instead of singing and dancing with the mega-hit maker, the fan shocked Perry by getting a little too handy with her. 
>> Read more trending stories 
The fan, identified as Rayane, or as Perry called her "Raiaiaia," grabbed the songstress and kissed her multiple times, Entertainment Tonight reported. 
To redirect Rayane, she asked her to teach her a little Portuguese before the pair posed for a selfie.
